translations: v.重新发生，重新出现（reoccur 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: And that this rumor started in 2003 and has since reoccurred at the end of August every year since.
sentences.translation: 这传言开始于2003年，从此每年8月底都会再现。

sentences.sentence: The osteomyelitis reoccurred in 2 cases 6 months later had achieved healed by nidus clearing finally.
sentences.translation: 骨髓炎6个月后复发2例，经二次病灶清除后愈合。
